ModMetaData.name: LMC049.铁丝网
ModMetaData.author: okmkz
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Version: 0.4a Adds barbed wire, a simple defensive structure that slows movement and provides no cover 添加了铁丝网，简单的防御结构，减缓敌人移动速度，不提供掩护。 汉化：jxb12306 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Official mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=811181658
